originalText.text: Overall, I couldn't have asked for a better real estate agent than Zach Zachariadis. They exceeded my expectations and made the real estate transaction a positive and rewarding experience. I highly recommend Zach to anyone in need of a dedicated and knowledgeable real estate professional.

text.text: Overall, I couldn't have asked for a better real estate agent than Zach Zachariadis. They exceeded my expectations and made the real estate transaction a positive and rewarding experience. I highly recommend Zach to anyone in need of a dedicated and knowledgeable real estate professional.

originalText.text: Working with TZM Realty, especially Zach, was one of the smoothest, least stressful experiences I've had with realtors in NYC, and if you live here, that means a lot! They're professional, accommodating and kind.

text.text: Working with TZM Realty, especially Zach, was one of the smoothest, least stressful experiences I've had with realtors in NYC, and if you live here, that means a lot! They're professional, accommodating and kind.

originalText.text:
This has been the BEST EXPERIENCE I have had with a real estate agent, whether it was buying a home or renting apartments overseas. The service and support I received was definitely world-class. Thank you, thank you, thank you!

My brilliant daughter (who will be a graduate student at NYU Tisch this Fall) and I spent no less than four hours a day for the past 10 days searching [online] for apartments, making phone calls to "student housing buildings," dealing with other agents, submitting applications, etc.

We learned some hard lessons along the way. We got outbid and outmaneuvered. Our character got overlooked - and we actually started to feel unworthy and discriminated against because we were seemingly economically disadvantaged.

Looking at the average annual household income in NYC ($107,000), we struggle to understand how so people can afford to live in a city where housing demand far exceeds supply - and if it weren't for rent control - so many wouldn't be able to live and work in what is supposed to be one of the greatest cities in the world. Not just in NY state, not just in the US, but the world.

NYC was the "Golden Door" between 1851 - 1900; 70% of all immigrants coming to the US came through NYC. It's so diverse, but it seems the soaring cost of living squashes future growth, freedom, culture, and community.

I appreciate the NYC rental market is really tough right now - too much demand and little inventory. I want to just express my sincere appreciation and gratitude to Zach for his assistance in the process. I don't doubt he received hundreds of inquiries on this apartment. But, he treated us like we were genuinely his personal client. He walked us through the process. We were able to pull the necessary documentation together along with our applications to apply. He is conscientious, pleasant, positive, and a straight-shooter.

Thank you so much! And thank you for personally calling my daughter to inform her she was approved.

originalText.text: We had a great experience with Zach! He was extremely competent straight shooter - very organized and responsive. Really demystified the process for us and helped us land a great apartment. Very happy in our new abode!

text.text: We had a great experience with Zach! He was extremely competent straight shooter - very organized and responsive. Really demystified the process for us and helped us land a great apartment. Very happy in our new abode!

originalText.text: We had an amazing experience with TZM reality. We worked with Zach Zachariadis, who was genuine, helpful, friendly, and exceptionally communicative throughout our process of looking for an apartment. My husband and I started our apartment hunt in the peak of summer 2022 when housing inventory in NYC was at an all-time low, and prices were exorbitantly high. Zach found us an incredible apartment in Astoria. Due to unforeseen circumstances, the apartment was not available when it was supposed to be. Zach did an excellent job of working with the management company and not only keeping us up-to-date, but also advocating for us during every step of the way. His approachability and dedication to his clients are what make him a stand-out realtor. We are very grateful for Zach’s work, and HIGHLY recommend him to others.
